findings.title: M1: Missing data validation
findings.description: Medium severity issue related to missing data validation.

findings.title: M2: Usage of deprecated function
findings.description: Usage of a deprecated function leading to undefined behavior

findings.title: M3: Empty receive
findings.description: The contract contains an empty receive function that allows sending Ether to the contract address. However, there is no transfer function to obtain it back.

findings.title: W1: Usage of solc optimizer
findings.description: Until the `solc` optimizer undergoes more stringent security analysis, opt-out using it.

findings.title: Borrow module is missing implementation for claiming rewards
findings.description: The `_claimRewards` function in the `AaveV3BorrowLibrary` library is missing implementation, resulting in no rewards being claimed after calling this function.

findings.title: I2: Documentation
findings.description: The NatSpec documentation is missing. Functions should contain explanations for function parameters and return values.

findings.title: I3: Unused function parameter
findings.description: The `_claimRewards` function in the `StrategyUs3UsdcWeth` contract has an unused parameter `_to`. As a result, any address that is passed does not affect the function.
